title: President Donald J. Trump’s 500 Days of Making Our Communities Safer and More Secure – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
June 5, 2018
Together, we are building a safe, strong, and proud America.
						President Donald J. Trump					SECURING AMERICA’S BORDERS AND ENFORCING AMERICA’S LAWS: President Donald J. Trump has worked to secure our borders and fully enforce our Nation’s immigration laws. HELPING AMERICAN COMMUNITIES HIT BY THE OPIOID CRISIS: President Donald J. Trump’s Administration has fought back against the opioid crisis devastating communities.
